00016 static const unsigned int CLEAR_TASKS_EVERYTIME = 0;
00017 
00018 static const unsigned int PAUSING_BLANK_BEFORE = 1;
00019 static const unsigned int PAUSING_BLANK_AFTER = 1;
00020 
00021 #include "interface.h"
00022 
00023 static const TaskHandle TASK_UNDEF = ((TaskHandle)-1);
00024 static const double RESOLUTION_UNDEF = 1e-5;
00025 
00026 template <typename T>
00027 inline T *fastFill(T* p, T x, unsigned int cnt);
00028 
00029 XNIDAQmxPulser::XNIDAQmxPulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00030                                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00031                                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00032                                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00033                                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00034     XNIDAQmxDriver<XPulser>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00035     m_pausingBit(0), m_pausingCount(0), 
00036     m_running(false),
00037     m_resolutionDO(RESOLUTION_UNDEF),
00038     m_resolutionAO(RESOLUTION_UNDEF),
00039     m_taskAO(TASK_UNDEF),
00040     m_taskDO(TASK_UNDEF),
00041     m_taskDOCtr(TASK_UNDEF),
00042     m_taskGateCtr(TASK_UNDEF)
00043 {
00044     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < NUM_DO_PORTS; i++)
00045         portSel(i)->add("Pausing(PFI4)");
00046     const int ports[] = {
00047         PORTSEL_GATE, PORTSEL_PREGATE, PORTSEL_TRIG1, PORTSEL_TRIG2,
00048         PORTSEL_GATE3, PORTSEL_COMB, PORTSEL_QSW, PORTSEL_ASW
00049     };
00050     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < sizeof(ports)/sizeof(int); i++) {
00051         portSel(i)->value(ports[i]);
00052     }
00053     m_softwareTrigger = XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::create(name, NUM_DO_PORTS);
00054     
00055     m_pausingCount = (PAUSING_BLANK_BEFORE + PAUSING_BLANK_AFTER) * 47;
00056     
00057     //memory locks.
00058     if(g_bUseMLock) {
00059         const void *FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER = &m_genPatternList;
00060         const void *LAST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER = &m_lowerLimAO[NUM_AO_CH];
00061         mlock(FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER, (size_t)LAST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER - (size_t)FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 XNIDAQmxPulser::~XNIDAQmxPulser()
00066 {
00067     clearTasks();
00068     XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::unregister(m_softwareTrigger);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void
00072 XNIDAQmxPulser::openDO(bool use_ao_clock) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00073 {
00074     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> tlock(m_totalLock);
00075 
00076     if(intfDO()->maxDORate(1) == 0)
00077         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("HW-timed transfer needed."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00078     
00079     if(m_resolutionDO == RESOLUTION_UNDEF)
00080         m_resolutionDO = 1.0 / intfDO()->maxDORate(1);
00081     fprintf(stderr, "Using DO rate = %f[kHz]\n", 1.0/m_resolutionDO);
00082     setupTasksDO(use_ao_clock);
00083         
00084     m_suspendDO = true;     
00085     m_threadWriteDO.reset(new XThread<XNIDAQmxPulser>(shared_from_this(),
00086                                                       &XNIDAQmxPulser::executeWriteDO));
00087     m_threadWriteDO->resume();
00088 }
00089 
00090 void
00091 XNIDAQmxPulser::openAODO() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00092 {
00093     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> tlock(m_totalLock);
00094     
00095     if(intfDO()->maxDORate(1) == 0)
00096         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("HW-timed transfer needed."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00097     if(intfAO()->maxAORate(2) == 0)
00098         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("HW-timed transfer needed."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00099     
00100     if((m_resolutionDO == RESOLUTION_UNDEF) || (m_resolutionAO == RESOLUTION_UNDEF))
00101     {
00102         double do_rate = intfDO()->maxDORate(1);
00103         double ao_rate = intfAO()->maxAORate(2);
00104         if(ao_rate <= do_rate)
00105             do_rate = ao_rate;
00106         else {
00107             //Oversampling is unstable.
00108             int oversamp = 1; //lrint(ao_rate / do_rate);
00109             ao_rate = do_rate * oversamp;
00110         }
00111         m_resolutionDO = 1.0 / do_rate;
00112         m_resolutionAO = 1.0 / ao_rate;
00113     }
00114     fprintf(stderr, "Using AO rate = %f[kHz]\n", 1.0/m_resolutionAO);
00115 
00116     setupTasksAODO();   
00117 
00118     m_suspendDO = true;     
00119     m_threadWriteDO.reset(new XThread<XNIDAQmxPulser>(shared_from_this(),
00120                                                       &XNIDAQmxPulser::executeWriteDO));
00121     m_threadWriteDO->resume();
00122 
00123     m_suspendAO = true;
00124     m_threadWriteAO.reset(new XThread<XNIDAQmxPulser>(shared_from_this(),
00125                                                       &XNIDAQmxPulser::executeWriteAO));
00126     m_threadWriteAO->resume();
00127 }
00128 
00129 void
00130 XNIDAQmxPulser::close() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00131 {
00132     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> tlock(m_totalLock);
00133 
00134     try {
00135         stopPulseGen();
00136     }
00137     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00138         e.print();
00139     }
00140     
00141     if(m_threadWriteAO) {
00142         m_threadWriteAO->terminate();
00143     }
00144     if(m_threadWriteDO) {
00145         m_threadWriteDO->terminate();
00146     }
00147 
00148     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lockAO(m_mutexAO);
00149     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lockDO(m_mutexDO);
00150     
00151     clearTasks();
00152 
00153     m_resolutionDO = RESOLUTION_UNDEF;    
00154     m_resolutionAO = RESOLUTION_UNDEF;    
00155 
00156     intfDO()->stop();
00157     intfAO()->stop();
00158     intfCtr()->stop();
00159 }
00160 void 
00161 XNIDAQmxPulser::clearTasks() {
00162     if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF)
00163         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskAO));
00164     if(m_taskDO != TASK_UNDEF)
00165         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskDO));
00166     if(m_taskDOCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00167         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskDOCtr));
00168     if(m_taskGateCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00169         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskGateCtr));
00170     m_taskAO = TASK_UNDEF;
00171     m_taskDO = TASK_UNDEF;
00172     m_taskDOCtr = TASK_UNDEF;
00173     m_taskGateCtr = TASK_UNDEF;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void
00177 XNIDAQmxPulser::setupTasksDO(bool use_ao_clock) {
00178     if(m_taskDO != TASK_UNDEF)
00179         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskDO));
00180     if(m_taskDOCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00181         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskDOCtr));
00182     if(m_taskGateCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00183         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskGateCtr)); 
00184 
00185     float64 freq = 1e3 / resolution();
00186 
00187     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &m_taskDO));
00188     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateDOChan(m_taskDO, 
00189                                       formatString("%s/port0", intfDO()->devName()).c_str(),
00190                                       "", DAQmx_Val_ChanForAllLines));
00191     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxRegisterDoneEvent(m_taskDO, 0, &XNIDAQmxPulser::_onTaskDone, this));
00192 
00193     std::string do_clk_src;
00194     
00195     if(use_ao_clock) {
00196         do_clk_src = formatString("/%s/ao/SampleClock", intfAO()->devName());
00197         fprintf(stderr, "Using ao/SampleClock for DO.\n");
00198     }
00199     else {
00200         do_clk_src = formatString("/%s/Ctr0InternalOutput", intfCtr()->devName());
00201         std::string ctrdev = formatString("%s/ctr0", intfCtr()->devName());
00202         //Continuous pulse train generation. Duty = 50%.
00203         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &m_taskDOCtr));
00204         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateCOPulseChanFreq(m_taskDOCtr, 
00205                                                    ctrdev.c_str(), "", DAQmx_Val_Hz, DAQmx_Val_Low, 0.0,
00206                                                    freq, 0.5));
00207         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxRegisterDoneEvent(m_taskDOCtr, 0, &XNIDAQmxPulser::_onTaskDone, this));
00208         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgImplicitTiming(m_taskDOCtr, DAQmx_Val_ContSamps, 1000));
00209         intfCtr()->synchronizeClock(m_taskDOCtr);
00210         m_softwareTrigger->setArmTerm(do_clk_src.c_str());
00211     }
00212    
00213     unsigned int buf_size_hint = (unsigned int)lrint(2.0 * freq);
00214     //M series needs an external sample clock and trigger for DO channels.
00215     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgSampClkTiming(m_taskDO,
00216                                           do_clk_src.c_str(),
00217                                           freq, DAQmx_Val_Rising, DAQmx_Val_ContSamps, buf_size_hint));
00218 //    intfDO()->synchronizeClock(m_taskDO);
00219     
00220     uInt32 onbrdsize, bufsize;
00221     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskDO, &onbrdsize));
00222     fprintf(stderr, "On-board bufsize = %d\n", (int)onbrdsize);
00223     if(onbrdsize > buf_size_hint * 2) {
00224 /*      if(m_pausingBit) {
00225             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskDO, buf_size_hint * 2));
00226             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskDO, &onbrdsize));
00227             fprintf(stderr, "On-board bufsize is modified to %d\n", (int)onbrdsize);
00228         }
00229 */      buf_size_hint = onbrdsize / 2;
00230     }
00231     if(m_pausingBit)
00232         buf_size_hint /= 4;
00233     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgOutputBuffer(m_taskDO, buf_size_hint));
00234     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputBufSize(m_taskDO, &bufsize));
00235     fprintf(stderr, "Using bufsize = %d, freq = %f\n", (int)bufsize, freq);
00236     m_bufSizeHintDO = bufsize / 8;
00237     if(m_pausingBit)
00238         m_bufSizeHintDO = std::min(m_bufSizeHintDO, 16384u);
00239     m_transferSizeHintDO = std::min((unsigned int)onbrdsize / 4, m_bufSizeHintDO / 4);
00240     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteRegenMode(m_taskDO, DAQmx_Val_DoNotAllowRegen));
00241     
00242     {
00243         char ch[256];
00244         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_taskDO, ch, sizeof(ch)));
00245         if(intfDO()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_DMA_DO) {
00246             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDODataXferMech(m_taskDO, ch,
00247                                                    DAQmx_Val_Interrupts));
00248         }
00249         if(intfDO()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_XFER_COND_DO) {
00250             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDODataXferReqCond(m_taskDO, ch,
00251                                                       DAQmx_Val_OnBrdMemNotFull));
00252         }
00253     }
00254     
00255     if(m_pausingBit) {
00256         m_pausingGateTerm = formatString("/%s/PFI4", intfCtr()->devName());
00257         m_pausingCh = formatString("%s/ctr1", intfCtr()->devName());
00258         m_pausingSrcTerm = formatString("/%s/Ctr1InternalOutput", intfCtr()->devName());
00259         //set idle state to high level for synchronization.
00260         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &m_taskGateCtr));
00261         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateCOPulseChanTime(m_taskGateCtr, 
00262                                                    m_pausingCh.c_str(), "", DAQmx_Val_Seconds, DAQmx_Val_Low, 
00263                                                    PAUSING_BLANK_BEFORE * resolution() * 1e-3,
00264                                                    PAUSING_BLANK_AFTER * resolution() * 1e-3, 
00265                                                    m_pausingCount * resolution() * 1e-3));
00266         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgImplicitTiming(m_taskGateCtr,
00267                                                DAQmx_Val_FiniteSamps, 1));
00268         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetCOCtrTimebaseActiveEdge(m_taskGateCtr,
00269              m_pausingCh.c_str(), DAQmx_Val_Rising));
00270         intfCtr()->synchronizeClock(m_taskGateCtr);
00271 
00272         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgDigEdgeStartTrig(m_taskGateCtr,
00273                                                  m_pausingGateTerm.c_str(),
00274                                                  DAQmx_Val_Rising));
00275         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetStartTrigRetriggerable(m_taskGateCtr, true));
00276         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigEdgeStartTrigDigSyncEnable(m_taskGateCtr, true));
00277         if(!use_ao_clock) {
00278             char doch[256];
00279             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_taskDOCtr, doch, 256));
00280             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetCOCtrTimebaseActiveEdge(m_taskDOCtr,
00281                  doch, DAQmx_Val_Falling));
00282             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetPauseTrigType(m_taskDOCtr, DAQmx_Val_DigLvl));
00283             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigLvlPauseTrigSrc(m_taskDOCtr, m_pausingSrcTerm.c_str()));
00284             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigLvlPauseTrigWhen(m_taskDOCtr, DAQmx_Val_High));
00285 //          CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigLvlPauseTrigDigSyncEnable(m_taskDOCtr, true));
00286         }
00287     }
00288 }
00289 void
00290 XNIDAQmxPulser::setupTasksAODO() {
00291     if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF)
00292         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_taskAO));
00293     
00294     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &m_taskAO));
00295     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateAOVoltageChan(m_taskAO,
00296                                              formatString("%s/ao0:1", intfAO()->devName()).c_str(), "",
00297                                              -1.0, 1.0, DAQmx_Val_Volts, NULL));
00298     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxRegisterDoneEvent(m_taskAO, 0, &XNIDAQmxPulser::_onTaskDone, this));
00299         
00300     float64 freq = 1e3 / resolutionQAM();
00301     unsigned int buf_size_hint = (unsigned int)lrint(2.0 * freq);
00302     
00303     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgSampClkTiming(m_taskAO, "",
00304                                           freq, DAQmx_Val_Rising, DAQmx_Val_ContSamps, buf_size_hint));
00305     intfAO()->synchronizeClock(m_taskAO);
00306     
00307     int oversamp = lrint(resolution() / resolutionQAM());
00308     setupTasksDO(oversamp == 1);
00309     if(oversamp != 1) {
00310         //Synchronize ARM.
00311         if(m_pausingBit) {
00312             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetArmStartTrigType(m_taskDOCtr, DAQmx_Val_DigEdge));
00313             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigEdgeArmStartTrigSrc(m_taskDOCtr,
00314                                                            formatString("/%s/ao/StartTrigger", intfAO()->devName()).c_str()));
00315             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigEdgeArmStartTrigEdge(m_taskDOCtr,
00316                                                             DAQmx_Val_Rising));
00317         }
00318         else {
00319             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgDigEdgeStartTrig(m_taskDOCtr,
00320                                                      formatString("/%s/ao/StartTrigger", intfAO()->devName()).c_str(),
00321                                                      DAQmx_Val_Rising));
00322         }
00323     }
00324     
00325     if(m_pausingBit) {
00326         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetSampClkTimebaseActiveEdge(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_Falling));
00327         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetPauseTrigType(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_DigLvl));
00328         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigLvlPauseTrigSrc(m_taskAO, m_pausingSrcTerm.c_str()));
00329         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigLvlPauseTrigWhen(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_High));
00330 //      CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDigLvlPauseTrigDigSyncEnable(m_taskAO, true));
00331     }
00332 
00333     m_softwareTrigger->setArmTerm(
00334         formatString("/%s/ao/SampleClock", intfAO()->devName()).c_str());
00335 
00336     //Buffer setup.
00337     uInt32 onbrdsize, bufsize;
00338     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskAO, &onbrdsize));
00339     fprintf(stderr, "On-board bufsize = %d\n", (int)onbrdsize);
00340     if(onbrdsize > buf_size_hint * 2) {
00341 /*      if(m_pausingBit) {
00342             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskAO, buf_size_hint * 2));
00343             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskAO, &onbrdsize));
00344             fprintf(stderr, "On-board bufsize is modified to %d\n", (int)onbrdsize);
00345         }
00346 */      buf_size_hint = onbrdsize / 2;
00347     }
00348     if(m_pausingBit)
00349         buf_size_hint /= 4;
00350     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgOutputBuffer(m_taskAO, buf_size_hint));
00351     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputBufSize(m_taskAO, &bufsize));
00352     fprintf(stderr, "Using bufsize = %d\n", (int)bufsize);
00353     m_bufSizeHintAO = bufsize / 8;
00354     if(m_pausingBit)
00355         m_bufSizeHintAO = std::min(m_bufSizeHintAO, 16384u);
00356     
00357     m_transferSizeHintAO = std::min((unsigned int)onbrdsize / 4, m_bufSizeHintAO / 4);
00358     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteRegenMode(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_DoNotAllowRegen));
00359 
00360     {
00361         char ch[256];
00362         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_taskAO, ch, sizeof(ch)));
00363         if(intfAO()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_DMA_AO) {
00364             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetAODataXferMech(m_taskAO, ch,
00365                                                    DAQmx_Val_Interrupts));
00366         }
00367         if(intfAO()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_XFER_COND_AO) {
00368             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetAODataXferReqCond(m_taskAO, ch,
00369                                                       DAQmx_Val_OnBrdMemNotFull));
00370         }
00371         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetAOReglitchEnable(m_taskAO, ch, false));
00372     }
00373 
00374     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < NUM_AO_CH; ch++) {
00375         //obtain range info.
00376         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00377             m_coeffAODev[ch][i] = 0.0;
00378         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAODevScalingCoeff(m_taskAO, 
00379                                                   formatString("%s/ao%d", intfAO()->devName(), ch).c_str(),
00380                                                   m_coeffAODev[ch], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00381         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAODACRngHigh(m_taskAO,
00382                                              formatString("%s/ao%d", intfAO()->devName(), ch).c_str(),
00383                                              &m_upperLimAO[ch]));
00384         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAODACRngLow(m_taskAO,
00385                                             formatString("%s/ao%d", intfAO()->devName(), ch).c_str(),
00386                                             &m_lowerLimAO[ch]));
00387     }
00388     
00389 /*  CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetAOIdleOutputBehavior(m_taskAO,
00390     formatString("%s/ao0:1", intfAO()->devName()).c_str(),
00391     DAQmx_Val_ZeroVolts));
00392 */  
00393 }
00394 int32
00395 XNIDAQmxPulser::_onTaskDone(TaskHandle task, int32 status, void *data) {
00396     XNIDAQmxPulser *obj = reinterpret_cast<XNIDAQmxPulser*>(data);
00397     obj->onTaskDone(task, status);
00398     return status;
00399 }
00400 void
00401 XNIDAQmxPulser::onTaskDone(TaskHandle task, int32 status) {
00402     if(status) {
00403         std::string str;
00404         if(task == m_taskDO) { str = "DO"; }
00405         if(task == m_taskDOCtr) { str = "DOCtr"; }
00406         if(task == m_taskAO) { str = "AO"; }
00407         if(task == m_taskGateCtr) { str = "GateCtr"; }
00408         gErrPrint(getLabel() + "\n" + str + "\n" + XNIDAQmxInterface::getNIDAQmxErrMessage(status));
00409         m_suspendDO = true;
00410         m_suspendAO = true;
00411     }
00412 }
00413 template <typename T>
00414 inline T *
00415 fastFill(T* p, T x, unsigned int cnt) {
00416     if(cnt > 100) {
00417         for(;(int)p % (sizeof(uint64_t) / sizeof(T)); cnt--)
00418             *p++ = x;
00419         uint64_t *pp = (uint64_t *)p;
00420         union {
00421             uint64_t dw; T w[sizeof(uint64_t) / sizeof(T)];
00422         } pack;
00423         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (sizeof(uint64_t) / sizeof(T)); i++)
00424             pack.w[i] = x;
00425         unsigned int pcnt = cnt / (sizeof(uint64_t) / sizeof(T));
00426         cnt = cnt % (sizeof(uint64_t) / sizeof(T));
00427         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < pcnt; i++)
00428             *pp++ = pack.dw;
00429         p = (T*)pp;
00430     }
00431     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00432         *p++ = x;
00433     return p;
00434 }
00435 
00436 void
00437 XNIDAQmxPulser::startPulseGen() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00438 {
00439     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> tlock(m_totalLock);
00440     {
00441         m_suspendDO = true;
00442         m_suspendAO = true;
00443         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lockAO(m_mutexAO);
00444         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lockDO(m_mutexDO);
00445         
00446         stopPulseGen();
00447         
00448         unsigned int pausingbitnext = selectedPorts(PORTSEL_PAUSING);
00449         m_aswBit = selectedPorts(PORTSEL_ASW);
00450     
00451         if(CLEAR_TASKS_EVERYTIME ||
00452            (m_taskDO == TASK_UNDEF) ||
00453            (m_pausingBit != pausingbitnext)) {
00454             m_pausingBit = pausingbitnext;
00455             clearTasks();
00456             if(haveQAMPorts())
00457                 setupTasksAODO();
00458             else
00459                 setupTasksDO(false);
00460         }
00461         {
00462             uInt32 bufsize;
00463             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskDO, &bufsize));
00464             if(!m_pausingBit & (bufsize < 2047uL))
00465                 throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(
00466                     KAME::i18n("Use the pausing feature for a cheap DAQmx board.\n"
00467                                + KAME::i18n("Look at the port-selection table.")), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00468         }
00469         if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF) {
00470             uInt32 bufsize;
00471             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputOnbrdBufSize(m_taskAO, &bufsize));
00472             if(!m_pausingBit & (bufsize < 8192uL))
00473                 throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(
00474                     KAME::i18n("Use the pausing feature for a cheap DAQmx board.\n"
00475                                + KAME::i18n("Look at the port-selection table.")), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00476         }
00477 
00478         //swap generated pattern lists to new ones.
00479         m_genPatternList.reset();
00480         m_genPatternListNext.swap(m_genPatternList);
00481         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < PAT_QAM_MASK / PAT_QAM_PHASE; j++) {
00482             m_genPulseWaveAO[j].reset();
00483             m_genPulseWaveNextAO[j].swap(m_genPulseWaveAO[j]);
00484         }
00485 
00486         //prepare pattern generation.
00487         m_genLastPatItDO = m_genPatternList->begin();
00488         m_genRestSampsDO = m_genPatternList->front().tonext;
00489         m_genTotalCountDO = m_genPatternList->front().tonext;
00490         m_genBufDO.resize(m_bufSizeHintDO);
00491         if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF) {
00492             m_genLastPatItAO = m_genPatternList->begin();
00493             m_genRestSampsAO = m_genPatternList->front().tonext;
00494             m_genAOIndex = 0;
00495             m_genBufAO.resize(m_bufSizeHintAO);
00496         }
00497         
00498         const unsigned int cnt_preample = 1000;
00499         m_genTotalCountDO += cnt_preample;
00500         //synchronize the software trigger.
00501         m_softwareTrigger->start(1e3 / resolution());
00502 
00503         //prefilling of the buffers.
00504         if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF) {
00505             //write pre-ample.
00506             const unsigned int oversamp_ao = lrint(resolution() / resolutionQAM());
00507             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteRelativeTo(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_FirstSample));
00508             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteOffset(m_taskAO, 0));
00509             const unsigned int cnt_preample_ao = cnt_preample * oversamp_ao - 0;
00510             fastFill(&m_genBufAO[0], m_genAOZeroLevel, cnt_preample_ao);
00511             int32 samps;
00512             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxWriteBinaryI16(m_taskAO, cnt_preample_ao,
00513                                                 false, 0.5, 
00514                                                 DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00515                                                 m_genBufAO[0].ch,
00516                                                 &samps, NULL));
00517             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteRelativeTo(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_CurrWritePos));
00518             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteOffset(m_taskAO, 0));
00519             uInt32 bufsize;
00520             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputBufSize(m_taskAO, &bufsize));
00521             for(unsigned int rest = bufsize; rest >= bufsize / 2;) {
00522                 genBankAO();
00523                 unsigned int size = m_genBufAO.size();
00524                 for(unsigned int cnt = 0; cnt < size;) {
00525                     samps = std::min(size - cnt, m_transferSizeHintAO);
00526                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxWriteBinaryI16(m_taskAO, samps,
00527                                                         false, 0.0,
00528                                                         DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00529                                                         m_genBufAO[cnt].ch,
00530                                                         &samps, NULL));
00531                     cnt += samps;
00532                     rest -= samps;
00533                 }
00534             }
00535             genBankAO();
00536         }
00537         //write pre-ample.
00538         fastFill(&m_genBufDO[0], (tRawDO)0, cnt_preample);
00539         
00540         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteRelativeTo(m_taskDO, DAQmx_Val_FirstSample));
00541         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteOffset(m_taskDO, 0));
00542         int32 samps;
00543         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxWriteDigitalU16(m_taskDO, cnt_preample,
00544                                              false, 0.0, 
00545                                              DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00546                                              &m_genBufDO[0],
00547                                              &samps, NULL));
00548         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteRelativeTo(m_taskDO, DAQmx_Val_CurrWritePos));
00549         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetWriteOffset(m_taskDO, 0));
00550         uInt32 bufsize;
00551         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufOutputBufSize(m_taskDO, &bufsize));
00552         for(unsigned int rest = bufsize; rest >= bufsize / 2;) {
00553             genBankDO();
00554             unsigned int size = m_genBufDO.size();
00555             for(unsigned int cnt = 0; cnt < size;) {
00556                 samps = std::min(size - cnt, m_transferSizeHintDO);
00557                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxWriteDigitalU16(m_taskDO, samps,
00558                                                      false, 0.0, 
00559                                                      DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00560                                                      &m_genBufDO[cnt],
00561                                                      &samps, NULL));
00562                 cnt += samps;
00563                 rest -= samps;
00564             }
00565         }
00566         genBankDO();
00567         
00568         {
00569             char ch[256];
00570             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_taskDO, ch, sizeof(ch)));
00571             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDOTristate(m_taskDO, ch, false));
00572         }
00573         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskDO, DAQmx_Val_Task_Commit));
00574         if(m_taskDOCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00575             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskDOCtr, DAQmx_Val_Task_Commit));
00576         if(m_taskGateCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00577             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskGateCtr, DAQmx_Val_Task_Commit));
00578         if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF)
00579             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_Task_Commit));
00580     }
00581     fprintf(stderr, "Prefilling done.\n");
00582     //slave must start before the master.
00583     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_taskDO));
00584     if(m_taskGateCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00585         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_taskGateCtr));
00586     if(m_taskDOCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00587         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_taskDOCtr));
00588     m_suspendDO = false;
00589     fprintf(stderr, "Starting AO....\n");
00590     if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF)
00591         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_taskAO));  
00592     m_suspendAO = false;
00593     m_running = true;   
00594 }
00595 void
00596 XNIDAQmxPulser::stopPulseGen()
00597 {
00598     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> tlock(m_totalLock);
00599 
00600     m_suspendAO = true;
00601     m_suspendDO = true;
00602     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lockAO(m_mutexAO);
00603     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lockDO(m_mutexDO);
00604 
00605     m_softwareTrigger->stop();
00606 
00607     if(m_running) {
00608         {
00609             char ch[256];
00610             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_taskDO, ch, sizeof(ch)));
00611             uInt32 num_lines;
00612             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDONumLines(m_taskDO, ch, &num_lines));
00613             std::string chtri;
00614             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_lines; i++) {
00615                 if(m_pausingBit &&
00616                     (lrint(log(m_pausingBit)/log(2.0)) == (int)i))
00617                     continue;
00618                 if(chtri.length())
00619                     chtri = chtri + ",";
00620                 chtri = chtri + formatString("%s/line%u", ch, i);
00621             }
00622             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetDOTristate(m_taskDO, chtri.c_str(), true));
00623         }
00624         if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF)
00625             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_taskAO));
00626         if(m_taskDOCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00627             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_taskDOCtr));
00628         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_taskDO));
00629         if(m_taskGateCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00630             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_taskGateCtr));
00631         if(!CLEAR_TASKS_EVERYTIME) {
00632             if(m_taskAO != TASK_UNDEF)
00633                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskAO, DAQmx_Val_Task_Unreserve));
00634             if(m_taskDOCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00635                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskDOCtr, DAQmx_Val_Task_Unreserve));
00636             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskDO, DAQmx_Val_Task_Unreserve));
00637             if(m_taskGateCtr != TASK_UNDEF)
00638                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_taskGateCtr, DAQmx_Val_Task_Unreserve));
00639         }
00640 
00641         m_running = false;
00642     }
00643 }
00644 inline XNIDAQmxPulser::tRawAOSet
00645 XNIDAQmxPulser::aoVoltToRaw(const std::complex<double> &volt)
00646 {
00647     const double volts[] = {volt.real(), volt.imag()};
00648     tRawAOSet z;
00649     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < 2; ch++) {
00650         double x = 1.0;
00651         double y = 0.0;
00652         double *pco = m_coeffAO[ch];
00653         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00654             y += (*pco++) * x;
00655             x *= volts[ch];
00656         }
00657         z.ch[ch] = lrint(y);
00658     }
00659     return z;
00660 }
00661 inline bool
00662 XNIDAQmxPulser::tryOutputSuspend(const atomic<bool> &flag, 
00663                                  XRecursiveMutex &mutex, const atomic<bool> &terminated) {
00664     if(flag) {
00665         mutex.unlock();
00666         while(flag && !terminated) usleep(30000);
00667         mutex.lock();
00668         return true;
00669     }
00670     return false;
00671 }
00672 void *
00673 XNIDAQmxPulser::executeWriteAO(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00674 {
00675     while(!terminated) {
00676         writeBufAO(terminated, m_suspendAO);
00677     }
00678     return NULL;
00679 }
00680 void *
00681 XNIDAQmxPulser::executeWriteDO(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00682 {
00683     while(!terminated) {
00684         writeBufDO(terminated, m_suspendDO);
00685     }
00686     return NULL;
00687 }
00688 
00689 void
00690 XNIDAQmxPulser::writeBufAO(const atomic<bool> &terminated, const atomic<bool> &suspended)
00691 {
00692     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_mutexAO);
00693 
00694     if(tryOutputSuspend(suspended, m_mutexAO, terminated))
00695         return;
00696 
00697     const double dma_ao_period = resolutionQAM();
00698     const unsigned int size = m_genBufAO.size();
00699     try {
00700         for(unsigned int cnt = 0; cnt < size;) {
00701             int32 samps;
00702             samps = std::min(size - cnt, m_transferSizeHintAO);
00703             while(!terminated) {
00704                 if(tryOutputSuspend(suspended, m_mutexAO, terminated))
00705                     return;
00706                 uInt32 space;
00707                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetWriteSpaceAvail(m_taskAO, &space));
00708                 if(space >= (uInt32)samps)
00709                     break;
00710                 usleep(lrint(1e3 * samps * dma_ao_period));
00711             }
00712             if(terminated)
00713                 break;
00714             int32 written;
00715             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxWriteBinaryI16(m_taskAO, samps, false, 0.0, 
00716                                                 DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00717                                                 m_genBufAO[cnt].ch,
00718                                                 &written, NULL));
00719             if(written != samps)
00720                 fprintf(stderr, "%d != %d\n", (int)written, (int)samps);
00721             cnt += written;
00722         }
00723         if(terminated)
00724             return;
00725         genBankAO();
00726     }
00727     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00728         e.print(getLabel());
00729         m_suspendDO = true;
00730         m_suspendAO = true;
00731         return;
00732     }
00733     return;
00734 }
00735 void
00736 XNIDAQmxPulser::writeBufDO(const atomic<bool> &terminated, const atomic<bool> &suspended)
00737 {
00738     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_mutexDO);
00739 
00740     if(tryOutputSuspend(suspended, m_mutexDO, terminated))
00741         return;
00742 
00743     const double dma_do_period = resolution();
00744     const unsigned int size = m_genBufDO.size();
00745     try {
00746         for(unsigned int cnt = 0; cnt < size;) {
00747             int32 samps;
00748             samps = std::min(size - cnt, m_transferSizeHintDO);
00749             while(!terminated) {
00750                 if(tryOutputSuspend(suspended, m_mutexDO, terminated))
00751                     return;
00752                 uInt32 space;
00753                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetWriteSpaceAvail(m_taskDO, &space));
00754                 if(space >= (uInt32)samps)
00755                     break;
00756                 usleep(lrint(1e3 * samps * dma_do_period));
00757             }
00758             if(terminated)
00759                 break;
00760             int32 written;
00761             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxWriteDigitalU16(m_taskDO, samps, false, 0.0, 
00762                                                  DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00763                                                  &m_genBufDO[cnt],
00764                                                  &written, NULL));
00765             if(written != samps)
00766                 fprintf(stderr, "%d != %d\n", (int)written, (int)samps);
00767             cnt += written;
00768         }
00769         if(terminated)
00770             return;
00771         genBankDO();
00772     }
00773     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00774         e.print(getLabel());
00775         m_suspendDO = true;
00776         m_suspendAO = true;
00777         return;     
00778     }
00779     return;
00780 }
00781 void
00782 XNIDAQmxPulser::genBankDO()
00783 {
00784     GenPatternIterator it = m_genLastPatItDO;
00785     uint32_t pat = it->pattern;
00786     uint64_t tonext = m_genRestSampsDO;
00787     uint64_t total = m_genTotalCountDO;
00788     const tRawDO pausingbit = m_pausingBit;
00789     const tRawDO aswbit = m_aswBit;
00790     const uint64_t pausing_cnt = m_pausingCount;
00791     const uint64_t pausing_cnt_blank_before = PAUSING_BLANK_BEFORE + PAUSING_BLANK_AFTER;
00792     const uint64_t pausing_cnt_blank_after = 1;
00793     const uint64_t pausing_period = pausing_cnt + pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after;
00794     
00795     shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &vt = m_softwareTrigger;
00796     
00797     tRawDO *pDO = &m_genBufDO[0];
00798     const unsigned int size = m_bufSizeHintDO;
00799     for(unsigned int samps_rest = size; samps_rest;) {
00800         //pattern of digital lines.
00801         tRawDO patDO = PAT_DO_MASK & pat;
00802         //No QAM nor ASW.
00803         if(pausingbit && ((pat & PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK) == 0) && !(pat & aswbit)) {
00804             //generate a pausing trigger.
00805             ASSERT(tonext > 0);
00806             unsigned int lps = (unsigned int)std::min(
00807                 (uint64_t)(samps_rest / (pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after)),
00808                 (tonext - 1) / pausing_period);
00809             patDO &= ~pausingbit;
00810             if(lps) {
00811                 samps_rest -= lps * (pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after);
00812                 tonext -= lps * pausing_period;
00813                 tRawDO patDO_or_p = patDO | pausingbit;
00814                 for(unsigned int lp = 0; lp < lps; lp++) {
00815                     for(int i = 0; i < pausing_cnt_blank_before; i++)
00816                         *pDO++ = patDO_or_p;
00817                     for(int i = 0; i < pausing_cnt_blank_after; i++)
00818                         *pDO++ = patDO;
00819                 }
00820             }
00821             if(samps_rest < pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after)
00822                 break; 
00823         }
00824         //number of samples to be written into buffer.
00825         unsigned int gen_cnt = std::min((uint64_t)samps_rest, tonext);
00826         //write digital pattern.
00827         pDO = fastFill(pDO, patDO, gen_cnt);
00828         
00829         tonext -= gen_cnt;
00830         samps_rest -= gen_cnt;
00831         ASSERT(samps_rest < size);
00832         if(tonext == 0) {
00833             it++;
00834             if(it == m_genPatternList->end()) {
00835                 it = m_genPatternList->begin();
00836 //              printf("p.\n");
00837             }
00838             tonext = it->tonext;
00839             vt->changeValue(pat, it->pattern, total);
00840             pat = it->pattern;
00841             total += tonext;
00842         }
00843     }
00844     m_genBufDO.resize((unsigned int)(pDO - &m_genBufDO[0]));
00845     ASSERT(pDO == &m_genBufDO[m_genBufDO.size()]);
00846     m_genRestSampsDO = tonext;
00847     m_genLastPatItDO = it;
00848     m_genTotalCountDO = total;
00849 }
00850 void
00851 XNIDAQmxPulser::genBankAO()
00852 {
00853     const unsigned int oversamp_ao = lrint(resolution() / resolutionQAM());
00854 
00855     GenPatternIterator it = m_genLastPatItAO;
00856     uint32_t pat = it->pattern;
00857     uint64_t tonext = m_genRestSampsAO;
00858     unsigned int aoidx = m_genAOIndex;
00859     const tRawDO pausingbit = m_pausingBit;
00860     const tRawDO aswbit = m_aswBit;
00861     uint64_t pausing_cnt = m_pausingCount;
00862     uint64_t pausing_cnt_blank_before = PAUSING_BLANK_BEFORE + PAUSING_BLANK_AFTER;
00863     uint64_t pausing_cnt_blank_after = 1;
00864     const uint64_t pausing_period = pausing_cnt + pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after;
00865 
00866     tRawAOSet *pAO = &m_genBufAO[0];
00867     const tRawAOSet raw_zero = m_genAOZeroLevel;
00868     const unsigned int size = m_bufSizeHintAO;
00869     for(unsigned int samps_rest = size; samps_rest >= oversamp_ao;) {
00870         unsigned int pidx = (pat & PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK) / PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX;
00871 
00872         //No QAM nor ASW.
00873         if(pausingbit && (pidx == 0) && !(pat & aswbit)) {
00874             //generate a pausing trigger.
00875             ASSERT(tonext > 0);
00876             unsigned int lps = (unsigned int)std::min(
00877                 (uint64_t)(samps_rest / oversamp_ao / (pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after)),
00878                 (tonext - 1) / pausing_period);
00879             if(lps) {
00880                 tonext -= lps * pausing_period;
00881                 lps *= oversamp_ao * (pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after);
00882                 samps_rest -= lps;
00883                 pAO = fastFill(pAO, raw_zero, lps);
00884             }
00885             if(samps_rest / oversamp_ao < pausing_cnt_blank_before + pausing_cnt_blank_after)
00886                 break; 
00887         }
00888         //number of samples to be written into buffer.
00889         unsigned int gen_cnt = std::min((uint64_t)samps_rest, tonext * oversamp_ao);
00890         gen_cnt = (gen_cnt / oversamp_ao) * oversamp_ao;
00891         if(pidx == 0) {
00892             //write blank in analog lines.
00893             aoidx = 0;
00894             pAO = fastFill(pAO, raw_zero, gen_cnt);
00895         }
00896         else {
00897             unsigned int pnum = (pat & PAT_QAM_MASK) / PAT_QAM_PHASE - (PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX/PAT_QAM_PHASE);
00898             ASSERT(pnum < PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK / PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX);
00899             if(!m_genPulseWaveAO[pnum].get() ||
00900                (m_genPulseWaveAO[pnum]->size() < gen_cnt + aoidx))
00901                 throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Invalid pulse patterns."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00902             tRawAOSet *pGenAO = &m_genPulseWaveAO[pnum]->at(aoidx);
00903 /*          for(unsigned int cnt = 0; cnt < gen_cnt; cnt++)
00904  *pAO++ = *pGenAO++;*/
00905             memcpy(pAO, pGenAO, gen_cnt * sizeof(tRawAOSet));
00906             pAO += gen_cnt;
00907             aoidx += gen_cnt;
00908         }
00909         tonext -= gen_cnt / oversamp_ao;
00910         samps_rest -= gen_cnt;
00911         ASSERT(samps_rest < size);
00912         if(tonext == 0) {
00913             it++;
00914             if(it == m_genPatternList->end()) {
00915                 it = m_genPatternList->begin();
00916 //              printf("p.\n");
00917             }
00918             pat = it->pattern;
00919             tonext = it->tonext;
00920         }
00921     }
00922     m_genBufAO.resize((unsigned int)(pAO - &m_genBufAO[0]));
00923     ASSERT(pAO == &m_genBufAO[m_genBufAO.size()]);
00924     ASSERT(m_genBufAO.size() % oversamp_ao == 0);
00925     m_genRestSampsAO = tonext;
00926     m_genLastPatItAO = it;
00927     m_genAOIndex = aoidx;
00928 }
00929 
00930 void
00931 XNIDAQmxPulser::createNativePatterns()
00932 {
00933     m_genPatternListNext.reset(new std::vector<GenPattern>);
00934     uint32_t pat = m_relPatList.back().pattern;
00935     for(RelPatListIterator it = m_relPatList.begin(); it != m_relPatList.end(); it++)
00936     {
00937         uint64_t tonext = it->toappear;
00938 
00939         GenPattern genpat(pat, tonext);
00940         m_genPatternListNext->push_back(genpat);
00941         pat = it->pattern;
00942     }
00943 
00944     if(haveQAMPorts()) {
00945         const double offset[] = {*qamOffset1(), *qamOffset2()};
00946         const double level[] = {*qamLevel1(), *qamLevel2()};
00947                         
00948         for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < NUM_AO_CH; ch++) {
00949             //arrange range info.
00950             double x = 1.0;
00951             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00952                 m_coeffAO[ch][i] = m_coeffAODev[ch][i] * x
00953                     + ((i == 0) ? offset[ch] : 0);
00954                 x *= level[ch];
00955             }
00956         }
00957         m_genAOZeroLevel = aoVoltToRaw(std::complex<double>(0.0));
00958         std::complex<double> c(pow(10.0, *masterLevel()/20.0), 0);
00959         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX; i++) {
00960             for(unsigned int qpsk = 0; qpsk < 4; qpsk++) {
00961                 const unsigned int pnum = i * (PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX/PAT_QAM_PHASE) + qpsk;
00962                 m_genPulseWaveNextAO[pnum].reset(new std::vector<tRawAOSet>);
00963                 for(std::vector<std::complex<double> >::const_iterator it = 
00964                         qamWaveForm(i).begin(); it != qamWaveForm(i).end(); it++) {
00965                     std::complex<double> z(*it * c);
00966                     m_genPulseWaveNextAO[pnum]->push_back(aoVoltToRaw(z));
00967                 }
00968                 c *= std::complex<double>(0,1);
00969             }
00970         }
00971     }
00972 }
00973 
00974 
00975 void
00976 XNIDAQmxPulser::changeOutput(bool output, unsigned int /*blankpattern*/)
00977 {
00978     if(output)
00979     {
00980         if(!m_genPatternListNext || m_genPatternListNext->empty() )
00981             throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Pulser Invalid pattern"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00982         startPulseGen();
00983     }
00984     else
00985     {
00986         stopPulseGen();
00987     }
00988     return;
00989 }
